text: Ra hamile tapa'imbhanda pahila pani rasulaharula'i (sandesavahakaharula'i) uniharuko jatibandhutira pathayaum, ra uniharule tiniharuko pasama khulla pramanaharu li'era a'e ani aparadhiharubata hamile pratisodha liyaum. (Tasartha) juna manisaharule imana lya'e tiniharuko sahayata garnu hamila'i jaruri thiyo
